title: solr's test-framework should have a "src/test" directory as a place to put "test the tes herlper code" style tests
description:
currently there is a smattering of test classes in solr-core that exist not to test solr itself, but to test that the base classes and helper code in test-framework behave as designed.

we should create a solr/test-framework/src/test directory for these to live in, just like the lucene/test-framework/src/test directory.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content: Alan: I think you already wrapped this up as part of the work you did on SOLR-8961 ... correct?

comments.author: Alan Woodward
comments.content: Looks like it, yes.  I'll look out for any other tests in solr/core that should really be in test-framework/tests as well.  Thanks Hoss Man!
